content: a gorgeously textured pattern designed as a 5 x 5 12 7cm x 12 7cm bonding square but is easily adapted for other sizes learn how to do two double_crochet cluster stitch in making this pattern includes photos to help you with this easy stitch pattern **recommended yarn ** best made in a soft non-scratchy baby dk #3 weight yarn approx 8 75-10 9yds 8-10m to make 2 yarn used king cole cherished **hooks & other materials ** us size 7 4 5mm us size h 5 0mm yarn needle stitch marker **skill level ** easy **what is a bonding square ** bonding squares are used in nicus to help the bond to form between premature and sick babies and mum when they can t always be together they are made in pairs mum wears one against her skin to pick up her scent it is then placed with the baby to comfort them every 12 hours or so they are swapped so the baby is always comforted by mum s scent the pattern has been tested for errors by crocheters with varying skill experience but should you have any difficulties please contact me for help **are you on my email list ** i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 1 **note on selling items and copyright** the pattern and all images belong to janferie mackintosh all rights reserved please do not copy or redistribute any part of the pattern you may not alter it to make your own pattern from it yes you may sell your finished items handmade by you in small batches only credit to me as the designer is appreciated and please always use your own photos so you show your own work **please note that instant download pdfs files cannot be refunded ** 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
